author: Sam Ross
description: A bittersweet aperitivo with balanced citrus sourness.
name: Too Soon
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Place 2 thin orange slices in shaker (no need to muddle)
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
